articles.title: Communities face major destruction after large tornadoes tear through the South and Midwest, leaving at least 24 dead - CNN
articles.description: Devastated communities across the American South and Midwest are digging through debris Sunday after ferocious storms and tornadoes this weekend left at least 24 people dead and leveled neighborhoods, as parts of the Southern Plains brace for the possibility …

articles.author: Jackie Wattles, Kristin Fisher
articles.title: NASA set to unveil the crew of astronauts for moon flyby mission - CNN
articles.description: Four astronauts — including three Americans and one Canadian — will be tapped by NASA to complete a generation-defining mission to the moon's orbit, returning humans to deeper into the solar system than has been reached in five decades.
